page.title: 04Summer Weekends
page.content: My favourite season of the year is summer.Each week I look forward to the weekend because usually I go sailing with my family.Sailing is our favourite form of recreation.We have a seven metre sailing boat but in case there isn't any wind we have an engine. Our boat has four berths but my dad made me a berth because we are a family of five. We sail down the River Trent to where the rivers Trent and Ouse join to become the Humber and then on to Hull or Grimsby after sailing under the Humber Bridge. I help my dad to sail the boat. Even when the water is rough I don't feel frightened. I like sailing and our boat. Even if we are not going sailing I go down to our boat with my fishing rod.
